mapper.select: SELECT u.*, r.role FROM USER u, role r WHERE username like #{username} AND u.role_id = r.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (username, password, fullname, email, role_id) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{fullname}, #{email}, #{role_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET fullname = #{fullname}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, birthday = #{birthday} WHERE username like #{username}
